item.title: Beogram 4002 (5513) Remote Control: Now With a Professionally Made PCB
item.description:
I recently had a professionally made circuit board manufactured for the remote control receiver in my Beogram 4002 (5513). It was exciting to see the new board arrive and start assembling it. The biggest changes in this design were simplifying the assembly by placing all the components on the top side and repositioning the ISP port to avoid interference with the aluminum top panel fixture. I also removed the reset button and made more space for the keypad connector...

item.title: Beogram 4002: Apple Remote Controls All Functions of Turntable
item.description:
After several weeks of testing, I’m excited to share my latest creation: a remote control receiver designed specifically for the Beogram 4002 (5513 model) turntable. This receiver seamlessly integrates with the turntable’s existing keypad connector without affecting its functionality. The receiver board is compatible with the latest Apple TV remote, chosen for its sleek aluminum design that complements the Beogram 4002’s aesthetic.
